channel.title: [pi] Command help

item.title: [pi] Command help
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

The vote is client sided, I just posted this in client help a few seconds ago.

if(inputString.equals("::vote") || inputString.equals("::Vote") || inputString.equals("::VOTE")) launchURL("VOTELINK");

Location: Your Client > Client.java

You can delete it or use this code

/* if(inputString.equals("::vote") || inputString.equals("::Vote") || inputString.equals("::VOTE")) launchURL("VOTELINK");*/

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Command help

item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

^ notice above, he added a line && c.playerRights >= 1
you can do this with any command at all. just add what he did after the actually command name

item.title: [pi] Command help
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

for ::xteleto to be Mod+ just replace it with this…

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto") && c.playerRights >= 1) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel); }

And with the ::vote command, i might be able to help you on it but could you please paste the code of it?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Command help
item.dc:creator: @kingsolona kingsolona
item.description:
@kingsolona wrote:

Well i want ::xteleto to be for mods. Thats basically it and this is what it says.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel); }
Also i have another problem. Theres commands like ::vote etc that ive removed, changed the name of, and everything yet when i type them it still comes up as erased pkz voting(erased pkz source). Any help?

Read full topic
